text: The baseline maternal and infants' characteristics are depicted in table 1. There were no significant differences in the infant baseline characteristics in both the groups-gestational age, birth weight, gender, antenatal steroid therapy, mode of delivery and need for resuscitation at birth.
sentences: The baseline maternal and infants' characteristics are depicted in table 1.

There were no significant differences in the infant baseline characteristics in both the groups-gestational age, birth weight, gender, antenatal steroid therapy, mode of delivery and need for resuscitation at birth.
